channel.title: CBN.com - Foundations of the Faith - Teaching Series - Video Podcast
channel.description: It has never been more important for Christians to understand what they believe and why. Pat Robertson teaches the essential truths that every Christian needs to know in order to stand strong and grow in their faith. These teachings will strengthen your faith and enable you to answer anyone who asks you to give a reason for what you believe.

image.title: CBN.com - Foundations of the Faith - Teaching Series - Video Podcast
